articles.title: Can COVID-19 spread through currency notes? Know what experts at European Central Bank say - Times Now
articles.description: Experts at the European Central Bank, in collaboration with the Department of Medical and Molecular Virology at Ruhr-Universitat Bochum, shed light on COVID-19 transmission through currency notes.
articles.content: Berlin: How long do coronaviruses remain infectious on banknotes and coins? Is it possible to become infected through contact with cash? Experts at the European Central Bank, in collaboration with th… [+2641 chars]

articles.title: Toyota's Johan van Zyl has died - News24
articles.description: Dr Johan van Zyl had a long career with the auto manufacturer, having served as CEO of Toyota SA and president and CEO of Toyota Motor Europe.
articles.content:
Dr Johan van Zyl, the executive chairperson of Toyota South Africa Motors, died on Friday, 30 July, at the age of 63.
